system.description:
Effect: For 3 Rounds, the user and its allies take half damage from damaging attacks.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Lapras and has an Ice-Type attack on their Active List.

actions.name: G-Max Resonance
